pageDescription: Shop PublisHearts exclusives with secure card checkout and instant email receipts.
heroTitle: Turning Small Pages Into Big Dreams.
heroCopy: Discover stories created with heart. Shop exclusive PublisHearts content not available through Amazon, including special editions, featured titles, and carefully selected accessories that bring our stories to life. Enjoy secure card checkout and instant receipt emails for your records.
featuredCopy: Discover limited releases, author signed copies, and exclusive add-ons created just for our website community.
promise1Copy: All payments are processed securely via Stripe, a globally trusted payment provider that protects your card information with advanced encryption and secure infrastructure. Learn more: Privacy Policy - https://stripe.com/privacy Security Overview - https://stripe.com/docs/security
promise2Copy: A copy of your detailed receipt is automatically sent to your email immediately after checkout!
promise3Copy: Find the story you love, add it to your cart, and check out securely with Stripe - simple and safe.
